item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: Power To The Powders
item.description:
Lets find out the BEST powder for you and get prepared to take on these HOT summer days..


 Pressed Powder?

 Perfection Pressed Powder 


This versatile, skin transforming formula is highly versatile. Apply dry or wet as a powder or foundation, for a natural matte finish. This portable compact is perfect for quick touch ups, and comes with both a puff and a sponge to build sheer to full coverage.

 Click a Swatch to find YOUR Shade 


 Loose Powder?

 Flawless Mineral Loose Powder 



Experience the hydration and brightening of our favorite age-defying mineral foundation. Brush away the signs of imperfections with this mineral foundation that visibly erases pores, lines and imperfections, for a naturally flawless, ageless look. This lightweight formula is good for hot summer days- If you want a sweep of color use a brush to apply & if you want long lasting color try using a patting motion with a beauty sponge!

 Click a Swatch to find YOUR Shade

item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: Naughty or Nice?
item.description:
Naughty or Nice?


The holidays are literally just right around the corner so if you're looking for a quick gift or something to wear at the holiday parties, here is some useful tips on how to style your pout this season!


Lip Tip 1 - Color Choice

We have selected a selection of two complete lip-looks to fit each mood you have this holiday season-- Naughty.. or Nice..

Click here for Color Renew Lipstick

Click here for Lip Pencil


Being bad never looked so good...

MaowMaow
Color Renew Lipstick:
Red Carpet Red

Lip Pencil: Apple


Color Renew Lipstick in Red Carpet and Lip Pencil in Apple


Or a little sugar, spice and everything...


MaowMaow



Color Renew Lipstick:
Red Carpet Red

Lip Pencil: Apple


Color Renew Lipstick in Joy and Lip Pencil in Natural


Lip Tip 2 - Full Pout

There are a ton of different ways of filling in the lips to give the illusion of a fuller pout out in the beauty-sphere these days. Here is how to use our quick and easy method with just a few steps.

*Begin lining the outline of your lips as usual with a thin line

*Now shade the outer corners with the lips with the lip pencil to give dimension

*Draw a line in the middle of the pout, where the middle of the cupid's bow is

*Cover the entire lip with our moisturizing Color Renew Lipstick

After completing these steps you instantly have a fuller-looking pout from giving dimension under the lipstick!


Hurry and Order these perfect gifts before December 10th so they arrive before Christmas!

item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: Baby Its Cold Outside
item.description:
Brr. Baby it IS COLD outside!

Old man winter has arrived and he is chilly. Unfortunately sweaters and leggings only go so far in fending off the cold which is why we found a few staple coats to keep in your closet through the season. Speaking of seasons, whats yours? If you don't know which one you are take our Color Quiz to find out! We have divided the options into style and season for you. Experience the difference in how wearing the RIGHT colors makes with our Color Quiz! Click Here


Wool Wrap Coat

This is how I would stay warm and style in the day time. Whether you're going to your job, you're going to an event or even if its just because you're just feeling yourself today, then this is the coat for that occasion. Classic fashion trench coat with the actual ability to keep you warm and also has POCKETS! Perfect length to wear with an full outfit or a dress. This fashion piece is so versatile, fitted and stunning it is a must have in everyone's closet!


We styled by season for you!

Spring: Khaki

Summer: Navy

Autumn: Khaki

Winter: Red/Black



 MaowMaow
Click the model to purchase!



Bomber Jacket

Styling a night out and staying warm is always a little bit of a struggle. Fashion industry is throwing out some really cute trends the past few years like the Bomber Jacket. Something about its militant style gives any look an immediate edge! This quilted bomber jacket will keep you warm no matter the occasion. You can dress it up or down with a fitting dress or a pair of jeans and a t-shirt, you're going to look glamorous either way!


We styled by season for you!

Spring: Khaki

Summer: Mauve

Autumn: Olive

Winter: Black/Burgundy


MaowMaow




Click the model to purchase!

Puffer Jacket

Puffer Jackets are not only surprising because they basically fold up into nothing, but they're hot almost like a down coat. I've kept one in my car and house for errands and days where I only wear athleisure because it just looks good. This type of jacket makes me feel put together--when I am not! The fashion-ability, portability, and warmth of this coat is not only a staple for your closet but also a fantastic versatile gift for your friends and loved ones!


We styled by season for you!

Spring: Pumice/Navy/Light Pink

Summer: Charcoal Heather/ Pumice

Autumn: Olive/Navy

Winter: Red/Black

MaowMaow
Click the model to purchase!

item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: On My Wishlist!
item.description:
The "Holidaze" is here and in full effect. I am a list person, trying to function off of lists and caffeine to remember things in my crazy life. So through out the year I will leave notes everywhere on my phone and desk. I usually find notes of things I think I would enjoy or even better, something someone I love would enjoy! So, I put together a wish-list for myself and for others including some of my all time favorites.

Color Me Beautiful has a bunch of good deals during the holidays you do NOT want to miss out.


Wishlist #1

Day 1 is all about treating your skin! The seasons have been.... undecided the past few years and this year has definitely taken a toll on my skin, DRY & DULL. It may sound like an easy fix hydration & exfoliation but its almost impossible to find a product that does both until now! Skin Correction Treatment Creme is the name and hydration plus exfoliation is its game. I have loved a lot of lotions in the past but all they did was put a waxy over my skin leaving it more dry than the day before and didn’t address boxy exfoliation. I used drugstore cream, boutiques, high-end and even fresh ones from farmers markets but none give long lasting results. This body cream is not only rich in Jojoba Seed Oil, Vegetable Collagen, Aloe, and Sodium Hyaluronate all which hydrate but Alpha hydroxy acids like Tartaric Acid, Glycolic Acid and Malic Acid to exfoliate.

PRO TIP: Try using a lotion applicator for those hard to reach areas. Here is our favorite!

Vive lotion applicator for hard to reach areas



Wishlist #2

Day 2 Underglow which softens the appearance of fine lines and hide imperfections. This enhanced formula incorporates a tri-peptide clinically proven to help boost skin’s hyaluronan production and allow needle-free HA based face contouring, for a visible remodeling effect and firmer skin.



Wishlist #3 & 4

Moisture Complex Foundation is a holy grail item! This foundation is water based so it doesn't feel heavy, has a medium/buildable coverage and contains amazing ingredients to help hydrate my skin!


PRO TIP: Using a makeup mixing palette is not only more hygienic but it doesn't wastes product. With a mixing palette you can also mix foundation shades if you're in between the different seasons! This stainless steel palette is perfect not only is it affordable, easy to keep clean, and reduces my breakouts! Plus you can use it to mix lipsticks, lipgloss, primer and anything else you can imagine!

Wishlist #5

Kicking it into gear with Day 5 of our wish-list count down! It's prime time and I'm not talking about television, I am talking about makeup routines. I need to tell you about this miracle product called Velvet Perfection Primer. Built with hyaluronic acid to keep hydrating your skin while also giving you a smooth canvas to work on. The smoothing properties fill in fine lines and wrinkles instantly improving the skin's appearance.



Wishlist #6

Color Pro Blush

We’re blushing! So excited to shade new, professional blush formulations in our new Color Pro Blushes. Never before have our shades been so pigment pure, blendable and easy to layer. Shades available in best sellers and trending new shades. Ladies, meet your newest obsession!




Wishlist #7

Eye Perfection Creme is amazing I used to have everyone at a cosmetic counter trying to sell me a 3 step eye cream regime. One for de-puffing, another one for moisture and the third one for anti aging!! That is crazy when this product does all those things effectively in one product! Eye Perfection Creme is a quad-action formula fortified with all the ingredients this product is revered for! Anti-aging, hydrating, revitalizing and de-puffing the eye area. I highly recommend to anyone for the holidays for this exact reason, it's a miracle cream.


PRO TIP: Treat yourself this holiday season to this extremely useful and revitalizing tool. An eye cream roller not only makes putting on eye cream feel luxurious because of the cool to touch feeling, but it also is relieving any residual swelling in the under eye area. stainless steel metal ball tip doesn't absorb the product but instead just disperses it in circular motion. This improves circulation in the eye area which happens to be the thinnest skin on our bodies so it does need a bit more TLC!


We will be checking things off my wish-list for the next 9 days! Stay tuned for discounts and makeup tips!

item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: A Stress Free Holiday & A Beautiful New You!
item.description:
The most traveled holiday is Thanksgiving weekend which means a lot of driving, cooking and family time oh and Black Friday shopping which is crazy!!! After staying up all night long you get a quick nap and its back to some family time then the long drive back! Now you're tired just thinking about it... well here are a few tips to fake it till you make it back to your comfy and cozy home!


QUICK BEAUTY TIPS

1. An Inner Corner highlight instantly brightens up your face and makes your eyes look more awake. Take a lighter color and place it directly in the inner corner of your eye. Model is wearing Color Sense Single Eyeshadow in "Gleam" Grab It Here!

2. Lots O'Lashes! Apply a good coat of mascara to the lashes to instantly make your eyes instantly look wider and brighter. Try our Sensitive Eyes Mascara Grab It Here!

3. Flush of Color on the lips will always pull a minimalist look together! The Lip-Lift Lip Conditioner in Blush is perfect for a pinch of color and extreme hydration Grab It Here!

CALMING LIFESTYLE TIPS

1. De-stress. Holidays can be a stressful time, cooking, cleaning, working, shopping, traveling with additional commitments to your friends and family. Try to anticipate sources of stress and develop a plan to manage them. This may involve committing to fewer get-togethers, less cooking or shopping online. Don't feel guilty; you have to take care of yourself before you can take of others.

2. Treat yourself. The holiday spirit is about helping others around you, but you also have to make time to take care of YOU! So treat yourself with something over the holidays. It may be something as simple as sleep. Wake up late and enjoy a day of rest; you need it. How about grabbing that lipstick shade you've always wanted? Take the time to do the things that make you happy.

OUR FAVORITE DE-STRESSING ITEMS

-------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------

item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: Which Go-To Beauty Item Are YOU Most Thankful For?
item.description:
We asked our customers which products they were THANKFUL for (and why). We got lots of wonderful answers. Here are a few of our favorites.


VEGETABLE PEEL OFF MASK

I am so thankful to have this as my beauty go-to. I have used this remarkable mask for years. And while I will, from time to time, venture out to try something new that I get as a sample or find as a mark down- I always return to my tried and true “Veggie Mask”. As I have gotten older, my skin has taken on a coarser texture. Nothing returns my skin to its more youthful state of softness and smoothness like this product. What a paraffin treatment does for my hands, Vegetable Peel Off does for my face, neck and chest area. What’s more, if I skip a couple of treatments, I can feel the difference in my skin.

- Jan Hargrove




SEASONAL SWATCH FANS

I am most thankful for my seasonal swatch fan (I'm a summer). It’s one item in my beauty “bag of tricks” that never runs out, gets me lots of compliments, helps me look younger and healthier, gives me confidence, and saves me money. What’s not to love? Here’s my own secret about swatch fans. I give them as gifts and people LOVE to receive them. All I need to know is my friend or family member’s hair color then I take the Color Quiz to find out their season. I did this with my sisters last year. We had so much fun trading clothes and doing online shopping after everyone got theirs. I plan to do it again this year with my book club!

- Darlene Hawn


EYE SHADOW BASE

Call me crazy, but I am most thankful for Eye Shadow Base. I know it’s inexpensive, but I can not make up without it. I never remember my eye lids being smooth, I would always envy women who could use eye shadow to create amazing looks. No matter whose eye shadow I used, or how expensive, it just disappeared- almost instantly. And then I found Eye Shadow Base and suddenly I had smoother eye lids like my friends. I had eye shadow that stayed on for the whole day. Then I started using my “secret beauty weapon” in other ways. I didn’t pack concealer on a trip and guess what… Eye Shadow Base worked great as a stand in concealer. Then I noticed how often I reapplied my lipstick, and I thought…hmmm? I used it on my lips, under my lipstick. And wow, mission accomplished. Lipstick that didn’t feather. So my vote goes to Eye Shadow Base.

- Candace LaFebre



We at Color Me Beautiful are most thankful for YOU, our loyal customers. You've been by our sides, cheering us on for more than three decades.

We love hearing from you all, sharing your stories of renewed self confidence and success - year round, but it's extra special during the holidays!

item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: Who's on your Winter Rescue Team?
item.description:
On my team, there are a few pairs of fuzzy socks and everything moisture! The elements take their toll during the winter months and I've found my way to combat them with this moisture magic trio!



Adrien Arpel Skin Correction Complex (ON SALE)
This cream uses AHAs to exfoliate the top layer of dead skin to allow extreme hydration to penetrate your skin. Its packed full of Apricot Kernel Oil, Avocado Oil, and Jojoba Seed oil which not only gives the skin much needed moisturization but plumps the skin up for a more youthful look.

Adrien Arpel Eye Perfection Creme (ON SALE)
The skin around our eyes is the thinnest skin on our entire body, so it needs a bit more TLC.
This Eye cream not only hydrates but it is clinically proven to smooth fine line and wrinkles.
Protecting you from the change of weather and preventing any future damage!

Adrien Arpel Skin Correction Creme (ON SALE)
Sometimes the heavy moisturizers we use before we go to bed can be a bit heavy and greasy while you're just trying to sleep! This body cream is a life saver. Packed with AHAs gently exfoliating your body and powerful hydrating agents that work all night saving your skin.


PROTIP: Ever wonder how dehydrated your skin really is? This new beauty tool measures skin's moisture to help you pick the right skin care products.

-------------------
Skin Moisture Analyzer


The skin analyzer reads an electrical resistance of your skin that will depend on the hydration. The dryer the skin, the higher the resistance. Hydrated skin will have a much lower resistance as water is excellent electricity conductor.


Delivers highly accurate and reliable results in a short amount of time. Easy to use with the one-button operation design. Will automatically detect and identify several different conditions beyond dry skin. Good for repeated use for consistent results.

item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: Looking Your Best This Holiday Season
item.description:
Looking Your Best This Holiday Season!

Mastering holiday style comes down to a few key elements: a glamorous holiday dress (in your season), shimmering jewelry (in your season), and of course, an alluring beauty look which you guessed it (in your season)! Check out these new holiday collections that will build your lipstick wardrobe from office parties to impromptu date nights, we rounded up the very best and placed them in a personalized collection just for YOU.

Need help determining your season? Try out our all-new Color Quiz HERE!
WINTERS

Winters can rock bold and jewel tones like cool blues, black, or bright pinks.

This holiday collection includes Color Lock Lip Pencil, Lip Lift Conditioner, and Color Renew Lipsticks in Perfect Plum, Soft Plum, and Rose Frost.



SUMMERS


Summers can wear soft, cool colors, including light blues, grey, or soft pink colors.

The Summer Holiday Collection includes Color Lock Lip Pencil, Lip Lift Conditioner, and Color Renew Lipsticks in Frosted Watermelon, Plum Sherbet, and Rose Frost.

AUTUMNS

Autumns can wear warmer, rich and deep colors, like olive, pumpkin, and rust.

The Autumn Holiday Collection includes Color Lock Lip Pencil, Lip Lift Conditioner, and Color Renew Lipstick in Blaze, Cinnamon, and Brown Sugar.



SPRINGS

Springs can also wear warmer colors, like mustard, teal, and browns.

This Holiday Collection includes Color Lock Lip Pencil, Lip Lift Conditioner, and Color Renew Lipstick in Mango Punch, 14K , and Chili Lipstick




Give the gift of CONFIDENCE this holiday season.
Regardless of your age or your sex, confidence is the most valuable gift that anyone can give, and understanding your perfect color palette is an incredible confidence booster. Why is that? Because color is magic, and everyone looks better in his or her perfect colors. In the right colors, we look healthier, less tired and younger! Who doesn’t need that? Even our teeth look whiter while our skin will look more radiant.
If that weren’t enough, the savings on having a perfectly coordinated wardrobe is substantial. Fewer items will be relegated to the back of the closet because “they just don’t look right.” All of your clothes will be coordinated with each other, making a capsule wardrobe easy to accomplish with fewer purchases.

item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: Building A Base!
item.description:
Is your foundation sinking into fine lines, wrinkles and pores makes my skin look rough and aged. If yes we need to work on build you a strong base. I'm a firm believer in starting from the bottom to create a flawless complexion, and it all begins with smoothing and pore-filling makeup primers like Velvet Foundation Primer, Underglow for the face and Eyeshadow Base for the eyes. These pore-filling primers give you a flawless complexion immediately! Not to mention these smoothing and blurring primers can be worn alone for a blurred appearance. It only takes a couple of seconds to apply, these primers and they are pretty much the ultimate five-minute makeup product.

HOW DOES IT WORK:

Your skin has pores (kind of like holes) and wrinkles (kind of like cracks), and our goal is to hide it all but imagine you are painting a wall with a bunch of holes and cracks you would prime first to create a smooth surface well that is exactly what a primer does. Check the diagram below! When you apply just foundation the foundation, sinks into pores and wrinkles creating an uneven canvas but by using a primer, it will fill in those pores and lines forming a smooth surface once you have your flat surface then it's time to paint!


BEFORE & AFTER


Model after image is wearing Velvet Foundation Primer and Moisture Complex Liquid Foundation.


PRIMERS

Looking to lift and highlight?

Underglow Primer

Looking to hydrate and smooth?

Velvet Foundation Primer

Looking to keep eyeshadow in place?

Eyeshadow Base


FOUNDATIONS

You might think not using a primer is the biggest makeup mistake, but using the wrong foundation formula for your skin type is also a major no-no. Not every foundation is made equal, from powders to creams and full coverage to light so look below for your must have foundation formula!


Looking for hydration, anti-aging with medium coverage?Looking for easy to use with full coverage?Looking for anti-aging, lightweight with light coverage?Looking for light coverage and convince?Looking for full coverage?
MOISTURE COMPLEX LIQUID FOUNDATION

LOOSE MINERAL FOUNDATION

MORNING LIGHT CREAM FOUNDATION

PERFECTION PRESSED POWDER FOUNDATION

CREAM TO POWDER FOUNDATION

item.description: Using papaya in skin care and beauty products has so many benefits, and we want to share with you some of them. As well as our skin care products made with papaya that we absolutely love!

item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: The Best Beauty Trends for Fall 2018
item.description: The most popular trends we are seeing are on entirely different ends of the beauty spectrum!

item.author: info@colormebeautiful.com
item.title: Alpha Hydroxy Acid Magic
item.description: AHAs or alpha hydroxy acids are a combination acids that aid in the exfoliation, hydration, and cellular turnover in the skin.
